title: Slopy
author: Slopy
created_time: September 18, 2023, 07:46:15 AMLast edit: September 18, 2023, 08:04:42 AM by Slopy
content: Slopy (SLOPY) is a meme token created on the Ethereum blockchain with a dynamic royalty system for holders.Royalties are randomly awarded to holders during transactions.Slopy is a one-of-a-kind meme character created from the fusion of an axolotl and a dragon. It embodies the spirit of fun, creativity, and unity.Total Supply:888,000,000,000,000 SLOPYBuy/Sell Fee: 0%Transfer Fee: 0,088% (0% For Master Wallet)ROYALTYDuring token transfer, a small commission is deducted from the transaction amount and sent to a randomly selected wallet address among the holders of SLOPY tokens. This rewards the holders with additional tokens, incentivizing them to retain and use Slopy tokens actively. In order to receive a commission from transactions, it is necessary to have a certain wallet balance. TIDY Wallet - A wallet with the necessary balance to receive a commission from a transaction.MASTER WALLETThe Master Wallet is a special wallet status that is exempt from paying any transaction commissions. Master wallet also receives royalties from transactions randomly, just like the TIDY wallet. To qualify for Master Wallet status, an address must hold a specific minimum balance of SLOPY tokens.Full technical documentation and how the royalty system works can be viewed in Whitepaper.In Q4 2023 will launch SlopyConnect - personal Slopy profile with rating system and exclusive bonuses for Slopy NFT owners on OpenSeaAdditionally, we are running cash giveaways among Slopy NFT collection owners.Roadmap: https://slopy.io/roadmap.pdfWhitepaper: https://slopy.io/Slopy_whitepaper.pdfLiquidity pool is locked https://univ3.uncx.network/lock/univ3/explore/tokens/chain/1/address/0x28d6cefdc7a57cb3e2958f61c95b20c76103fd79Slopy NFT Collections:https://opensea.io/collection/slopyhttps://getgems.io/collection/EQAzJSaEYhkTKBQHYmgko4Ey1z-LXbKun0UBubSoVXLh9OTzListed on DEX Uniswap and CEX XeggexWebsite: https://slopy.io/Twitter: https://twitter.com/SlopymemeTelegram: https://t.me/slopyportal https://t.me/slopyethEtherscan: https://etherscan.io/token/0x28d6CEFDC7a57cB3E2958f61c95B20C76103Fd79https://i.ibb.co/yyqx5CL/200logo200.png
